input.sentences: we headed into the museum for the exhibit .
we stopped by the snakes first .
then it was on to the evolutionary section .
they had an aquarium there that was the main attraction .
we got great pictures of the aquatic life before we left .
output.sentences: It's a field trip to the museum!
I am diggin' that stuffed cobra.
I'm not too happy about the stuffed ape, though.
Now we get to explore  that cave!
That cave led us right to the jellyfish in the acquarium!
